g.text: Sends ID=0 (ANI-Message) over the ANO port to the next connected Slice
recieves ANI-Message, with current `ID` as payload
Sends its own `Slice-ID + 1` (ANI-Message) over the ANO port to the next connected Slice
recieves ANI-Message, with current `ID` as payload
wait as long as the input has remained low for at least 100ms
scan for Slices are present and reachable
